name: Summer Corn Dip
author: moosie
summary: I had to improvise something that would go with salsa, but turns out, this is just as good on its own. It disappeared before the salsa did and everyone asked for the recipe! Serve with melba toast or tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 small roma (plum) tomato, seeded and chopped
½ cup fresh mint leaves, chopped
½ cup fresh basil leaves, chopped
2  Thai chile peppers, seeded and chopped
directions: Stir the corn, onion, tomato, cucumber, mint, basil, Thai chile peppers, lime juice, and mayonnaise together in a bowl
Refrigerate overnight or 8 hours before serving
